eu.cqse.check.framework.shallowparser.framework

Class ParserState<STATE extends java.lang.Enum<STATE>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.cqse.check.framework.shallowparser.framework.ParserState<STATE>

  • public class ParserState<STATE extends java.lang.Enum<STATE>>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds the parser state and also implements parts of the parsing algorithm. The benefit of separating them into a separate class is that we can reuse the same parser multiple times without resets and also concurrently in separate threads.
    See Also:
    ShallowParserBase

      • parse

        public int parse(STATE state,
                 java.util.List<IToken> tokens,
                 int startOffset)
        Attempts to parse exactly one entity in the given state. If the created entity is a continued node, this automatically continues parsing.
        Returns:
        Either the new parsing offset or RecognizerBase.NO_MATCH.

      • getCurrentMatchStart

      • getEntityStackSize

        public int getEntityStackSize()
        Returns the size of the current entity stack. This can be used to determine the depth we are currently parsing at.
